com.hbm.devices.scan.configure

Class ConfigurationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hbm.devices.scan.configure.ConfigurationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Observer

    public class ConfigurationService
extends Object
implements Observer, Closeable
    This is the main service which is used to configure a device.

    It sends the configuration settings and listen to responses. If no response is received within a certain time, a callback method (ConfigurationCallback.onTimeout(long timeout)) is called. Otherwise if a response is received, either ConfigurationCallback.onSuccess(Response) or ConfigurationCallback.onError(Response) is called accordingly to the response.

    The main method, which is used to transmit configuration settings, is sendConfiguration(ConfigurationParams, ConfigurationCallback, long).

    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigurationService

        public ConfigurationService(ConfigurationSerializer serializer,
                            ResponseDeserializer parser)
        This is the standard constructor to instantiate a configuration service.

        It starts the network multicast sockets for communication with the devices, the message parsers to convert incoming JSON Strings into objects or outgoing objects into JSON Strings.

        Parameters:
        serializer - the ConfigurationSerializer the ConfigurationService shall use.
        parser - the ResponseDeserializer the ConfigurationService shall use.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the ConfigurationService. Timers for outstanding Responses are cancelled and the ConfigurationSerializer is closed.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

        public boolean awaitingResponse()
        This method checks, if the service is waiting for a response.
        Returns:
        returns if the service is waiting for a response

      • update

        public void update(Observable observable,
                   Object arg)
        This method is called when any response packet is received. It checks if the received response corresponds to an earlier sent configuration query. If not, the response is dropped, otherwise either the onSucess or onError callback function of the corresponding query object is called.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer
        Parameters:
        observable - the observable object.
        arg - the received response.

      • sendConfiguration

        public void sendConfiguration(ConfigurationParams configParams,
                              ConfigurationCallback callback,
                              long timeout)
                       throws IOException
        This method sends a configuration via multicast. The method generates a queryID itself. If no response is received within the timeout, the callback method ConfigurationCallback.onTimeout(long timeout) is called. If a response is received, either ConfigurationCallback.onSuccess( Response) or ConfigurationCallback.onError( Response) is called.
        Parameters:
        configParams - the configuration parameters, which are send via multicast
        callback - the interface with the callback methods for error handling
        timeout - the time in ms, the service waits for a response. Must be greater than 0.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying socket send does not succeed.

      • sendConfiguration

        public void sendConfiguration(ConfigurationParams configParams,
                              String queryID,
                              ConfigurationCallback callback,
                              long timeout)
                       throws IOException
        This method sends a configuration via multicast. If no response is received within the timeout, the callback method ConfigurationCallback.onTimeout(long timeout) is called. If a response is received, either ConfigurationCallback.onSuccess( Response) or ConfigurationCallback.onError( Response) is called.
        Parameters:
        configParams - the configuration parameters, which are send via multicast
        queryID - the queryID to be sent via multicast
        callback - the interface with the callback methods for error handling
        timeout - the time in ms, the service waits for a response. Must be greater than 0.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying socket send does not succeed.
